text: Anybody else intrigued by the behavior of this virus? It can reinfect a host, even when that host has antibodies that presumably work to help others. If so, why aren’t they stopping the host from being reinfected? As if the virus were engineered to behave in unexpected ways...

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
